title: Intellectual Property Attorney
desc:
Post 47
***Trademark** (1x, Charge 120%)*
Choose any English word, four letters or greater. At the start of the next day phase, it will be announced that this word is now trademarked. For the rest of the game, anyone who uses this word for during the day phase will suffer a 2% score reduction each time they use it.
***Copyright** (Passive)*
Anyone who uses one of the words present in your evening response in their evening response will suffer a 4% score reduction for each use.
***Lawsuit** (2x, Locked)*
Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Attack a player who violated a Trademark during the most recent day phase, or who violated a Copyright during the most recent Evening phase.
***Royalties** (Passive)*
Any score points players lose to Trademark or Copyright abilities will be added to your Royalties pot as score boosts. Each evening phase, the Royalties pot will be evenly distributed between all Mafia members; unless this would result in less than a 2% distribution per player, in which case the pot will go to the Mafia Head(s), if any exist.
***Enforcement Action** (Passive)*
The responsibility to inform the host of how many Trademark violations occurred during the day phase, or how many Copyright violations occurred during the night phase, is yours (or another Mafia member's).
